While some it runs true to size, others mention it runs slightly big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute wardrobe capsule piece!
items.body: Absolute keeper. Great dress. Super soft & comfortable. Material isn't clingy, not see through, great weight, fits true to size. Not baggy, but not too fitted. I am 5'1" & 119 lbs & the small is a perfect fit. Not too long on my short frame. Ordered in caramel & color is gorgeous. Versatile, dress up with boots or heels, scarf & long sweater or down with cute sneakers & denim jacket. Ordered in navy too. Great capsule piece. Read more
items.author: Gina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and wearable for winter
items.body: I blame the entire internet. Why y'all out here gatekeeping these dresses?They are so pretty and wearable. Falls nicely over the body, slight sinch in the waste. I think it would flatter many body types. Lots of colors. Really soft, easy to iron material. I styled it with a cute scarf, tights, and knee length boots. I am about to buy more colors for the winter--crew neck and v-neck. Nicely done Sampeel. Read more
items.author: Mambo's Daughter

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great find - bought multiple colors
items.body: This dress is the absolute smoothest material I’ve ever felt! I ordered a medium as I’m usually wear a medium and it fit perfectly! Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish
items.body: Great dress it can be dressed up or down. True to size. I ordered 2 more. Perfect for fall or cool weather to wear with tights. The fabric is not too heavy but will be warm enough on a cool day. Read more
items.author: EB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely comfortable and stylish dress
items.body: Love this dress. The length is perfect and the fabric is so soft. Perfect for transitioning into fall. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Melde

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tight fitting in a large
items.body: Great silhouette, but runs small Read more
items.author: Pediatric Nurse for HIM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very versatile - good buy!
items.body: This dress feels as soft as butter! It can be styled in various ways, and I love it. I ordered both a medium and a large. I'm 4’10”, 130 pounds, with a 38DD bust, so I'm not sure what size will suit me best. The large is really loose—there's a lot of room—so I plan to return it for a medium. The medium fits comfortably without being baggy. I received many compliments, and the dress washed and dried very well. My only complaint is the lack of pockets. I have this v-neck dress in both long and sleeveless versions. They're versatile for many occasions—paired with sneakers for travel or with boots and a jacket for lunch or dinner. The price is very reasonable, and I think I’ve already gotten my money’s worth. I plan to buy more in different colors. Read more
items.author: emc0963

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Product
items.body: This is a horrible product! Do not purchase. The fabric is strange and clings to my body even though the dress is too large and too long. I would return it but they will only pay pennies on the purchase price. Do not buy from this company! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Beige, Blue, Black, Caramel, Coffee, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
